SpecialThank.sortByName: The list is sorted by name
thankNote: During the development and testing of this project, they have given a lot of help and support (or development, or testing, or sending invite, or suggesting, or encouraging, or spurring), thank you.
Since we can't list all the people who helped, Please understand if there are any omissions.
Thanks for these at the same time:

TechnologyStack.thankNote: The birth of 'PT Plugin Plus' is established on the base of these projects. Thanks all the participants of the project, thanks for your contribution!

localDownloadMethod.webTip: Open the page corresponding to the download link (only applicable to the simplest method; if conditions are not met, it will fall back to @:SetBase.download.localDownloadMethod.extension )
localDownloadMethod.browserTip: (RECOMMEND) Use the browser's download method provided by the extension to download directly
localDownloadMethod.extensionTip: The extension downloads the torrent in the background and proxies it to @:SetBase.download.localDownloadMethod.browser for downloading

the offline site will no longer participate in the search and information acquisition;
